Date Pickers

Date Picker

 
<!-- HTML SNIPPET -->
<div id="pickerId" class="date-picker">
    <label>Optional Label</label>
</div>

/* JAVASCRIPT SNIPPET */
// Callback function for when a date is selected
var callback = function(date) {
    // formatted date string
    ...
};

// Optional parameters
var options = {
    placeholder: 'placeholder' // Placeholder text for picker input
};

// Initialize DatePicker via ID with callback and options
new DatePicker('pickerId').init(callback, options);
 
<!-- HTML SNIPPET -->
<div id="pickerId" class="date-picker" aria-disabled="true">
    <label>Optional Label</label>
</div>
 
<!-- HTML SNIPPET -->
<div id="pickerId" class="date-picker" aria-invalid="true">
    <label>Optional Label</label>
</div>
 
/* JAVASCRIPT SNIPPET */
// Add the following to the Optional Parameters
{
    defaultDate: '2017-10-13' // a single Date object or a date string following the utilized dateFormat
}

/* JAVASCRIPT SNIPPET */
// Add the following to the Optional Parameters
{
    allowInput: true
}
 
/* JAVASCRIPT SNIPPET */
// Add the following to the Optional Parameters
{
    onlyInput: true
}

Date Range Picker

 
<!-- HTML SNIPPET -->
<div id="pickerId" class="date-range-picker">
    <label>Optional Label</label>
</div>

/* JAVASCRIPT SNIPPET */
// Callback function for when a date range is selected
var callback = function(dates) {
    // array of formatted start and end date strings
    ...
};

// Optional parameters
var options = {
    placeholder: 'placeholder' // Placeholder text for picker input
};

// Initialize DatePicker via ID with callback and options
new DatePicker('pickerId').init(callback, options);
 
<!-- HTML SNIPPET -->
<div id="pickerId" class="date-range-picker" aria-disabled="true">
    <label>Optional Label</label>
</div>
 
<!-- HTML SNIPPET -->
<div id="pickerId" class="date-range-picker" aria-invalid="true">
    <label>Optional Label</label>
</div>
 
/* JAVASCRIPT SNIPPET */
// Add the following to the Optional Parameters
{
    defaultDate: ['2017-10-13', '2017-10-15'] // an array of Date objects or date strings following the utilized dateFormat
}

Date/Range Picker - Options

Reset or Clear Functionality


 
/* JAVASCRIPT SNIPPET */
// Instantiate Picker into variable then initialize
var picker = new DatePicker('pickerId');
picker.init(callback, options);

// To reset picker back to default date (if provided)
picker.reset(); // executes callback, returning default date

// To clear picker
picker.clear(); // executes callback, returning null

The following options can be passed via the options parameter when initializing a date/range picker:


Click to View Date Format Tokens 
/* JAVASCRIPT SNIPPET */
// Add the following to the Optional Parameters
{
    dateFormat: 'F d, Y' 
}
 
/* JAVASCRIPT SNIPPET */
// Add the following to the Optional Parameters
{
    minDate: '2017-10-13', // a single Date object or a date string following the utilized dateFormat
    maxDate: '2017-11-13' // a single Date object or a date string following the utilized dateFormat
}
 
/* JAVASCRIPT SNIPPET */
// Add the following to the Optional Parameters
{
    weekNumbers: true
}
 
/* JAVASCRIPT SNIPPET */
// Add the following to the Optional Parameters
{
    removeIcon: true
}
